tooltips.text: It's party time! First we need some parts
Drag a Speaker to your app
Now add a Sticker to your app
First, we need a colorful background!
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="normal#set_background_color"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="colour_picker"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="part_0#speaker_loop"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="part_0#speaker_sample"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
Our sticker is a bit small. Let's make it bigger!
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="part_1#ui_scale"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="math_number"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
A control block will make the balloon move every frame
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="every_x_seconds"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
Let's move the sticker 6 pixels every loop
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="part_1#ui_move_by"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
We'll use a minus symbol to make it go backwards
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="math_number"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
Oh no! We lost our balloon. Let's get it back with logic!
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="controls_if"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
If the balloon moves off the screen, reset it
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="logic_compare"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
We'll check the sticker's current position
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="part_1#ui_x"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
If it's less than -100, reset it!
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="math_number"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
Time for the sticker to reset
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="part_1#ui_set_x_y"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="math_number"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
100px should be a good height for the balloon
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="math_number"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="part_1#set_sticker"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
We'll use random stickers to make it exciting!
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="part_1#random_from_set"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
Let's add a string so the balloon doesn't fly away!
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="normal#clear"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
A Move To block will keep the string steady
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="normal#move_to"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
Some maths will keep it straight
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="math_arithmetic"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="part_1#ui_x"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
A bit of padding will make it look better!
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="math_number"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
Let's pad the Y value too
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="math_arithmetic"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="part_1#ui_y"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="math_number"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="normal#line_to"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
Oh no! It's drawing the wrong way! Let's fix it.
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="part_1#ui_x"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space
Your parade is in full swing! Try remixing it by changing the stickers and variables!
